reviews.review_msg: Participation really matters, which is fine for some people but can be a struggle for others. Expect the unexpected in his class and be sure to read the rubrics, he will say you don't have to answer all the questions but do it anyways otherwise you will not get a good mark.

Mathew was a lovely prof who taught us difficult concepts. The class was unlike most university classes, as it was very creativity-based and allowed students to have freedom during assignments. Mathew was always very understanding and caring, often allowing extensions. The content itself was difficult to understand, but it was worth it.

Literally the best professor I have had at SFU. She cares about her students and understands outside forces that can cause one to struggle to meet deadlines. She also is very passionate about each subject she teaches. I really enjoy learning in her class.
